title: The emergence of early humans
description: Trace the evolutionary journey of Homo sapiens, examining key milestones from the first bipedal steps to the dawn of human culture.

title: The Stone Age: Paleolithic, Mesolithic, Neolithic
description: Explore the three major divisions of the Stone Age, their defining characteristics, tools, art, and the transition from hunting-gathering to settled communities.

title: Development of agriculture and early societies
description: Witness the birth of agriculture and its revolutionary impact on social structures, leading to the establishment of the world's earliest civilizations.
